name: 陳政順
objective: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及Castigliano定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Fundamental principles
3. Fundamental principles
4. Failure resulting from static loading
5. Fatigue failure 
6. Fatigue failure 
7. Design of shaft (stress and deflection) 
8. Design of shaft (critical speed)
9. Midterm
10. Spring design
11. Screw and Design of non-permanent joints
12. Design of permanent joints
13. Lubrication and bearing design
14. Gear design
15. Flexible Mechanical elements
16. Principles of form synthesis
17. Designing with plastic materials
18. Final Exam.
scorePolicy: 作業,課堂表現, 期中考, 期末考
